name: case_tracker
description: Apps Script project with GitHub sync

scripts.push-sync: clasp push && git pull origin main --rebase && git add . && git diff --cached --quiet || (git commit -m 'Push to Apps Script' && git push origin main)
scripts.pull-sync: clasp pull && git add . && git diff --cached --quiet || (git commit -m 'Pull from Apps Script' && git push origin main)
